role.argrole: belief or an idea (usually marked by:ب )

example.parse: (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_ACC ايمان) (NP-SBJ (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (PP-CLR (PREP ب) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الوحدة))))) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ازعج) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC رفاق) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)))
